docs.lead_paragraph: Apr. 19 12:26 p.m. | Updated: Scroll down for Dr. Greipp's latest responses to reader questions. And check back for regular updates.
docs.abstract: Dr. Philip Greipp of the Mayo Clinic answers readers' questions about multiple myeloma.
docs.snippet: Dr. Philip Greipp of the Mayo Clinic answers readers' questions about multiple myeloma.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some fear that while healthy employees might reap health insurance discounts, workplace programs could end up raising costs for the chronically ill.

headline.seo: Will Health Overhaul Incentives Also Penalize Some Workers?
headline.main: Could Health Overhaul Incentives Hurt Some?
headline.print_headline: Could Health Overhaul Incentives Also Hurt Some?

docs.snippet: Some fear that while healthy employees might reap health insurance discounts, workplace programs could end up raising costs for the chronically ill.

docs.lead_paragraph: "Do you drink alcohol?" Dr. David Oslin asked his new patient, a standard question.
docs.abstract: Older bodies do not metabolize alcohol as readily as they once did, making it important for caregivers to reassess the drinking habits of older family members.
docs.snippet: Older bodies do not metabolize alcohol as readily as they once did, making it important for caregivers to reassess the drinking habits of older family members.

docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists are studying the drugs’ potential for treating mental problems and illuminating consciousness.

headline.main: Hallucinogens Have Doctors Tuning In Again
